mapper.select: select h.addr1, h.name, r.price, r.max, re.checkin, re.checkout, re.count from host h, room r, reservation re where h.no = re.host_no and r.no = re.room_no

SELECT re.checkin, re.checkout, re.count, r.price, r.name room_name, h.name host_name, h.tel, h.imagename FROM reservation re, host h, room r WHERE re.mem_no = #{mem_no} and re.host_no = h.no and re.room_no = r.no
